check_py_length.rule: Max 350 lines per Python file (±10%). No 'God' files. Split large files into focused modules.
check_py_length.fix: Refactor the file into smaller modules, each with a single responsibility. Ensure each file is under 350 lines (±10%).

check_dependencies.rule: All dependencies must be listed in requirements.txt. No unused or missing dependencies.
check_dependencies.fix: Add any missing dependencies to requirements.txt. Remove unused packages. Run 'pip install -r requirements.txt' to update.

check_python_utilities.rule: All utility/setup scripts must be Python only.
check_python_utilities.fix: Rename or rewrite any non-Python scripts in the scripts/ directory to .py files.

setup_env.rule: Only one .env file at project root. All environment variables must be loaded via scripts/setup_env.py.
setup_env.fix: Move all .env files to the project root. Ensure all scripts/services use setup_env.py for environment setup.

manage_services.rule: All services must be healthy and managed via centralized scripts. Reuse healthy services, otherwise clean and restart. Use Docker Compose for service orchestration.
manage_services.fix: Ensure Docker and Docker Compose are installed. Use manage_services.py to check, stop, and start services as needed.

sync_board_to_github.rule: Board TSV and GitHub issues must be kept in sync. Issues must be created for all board items.
sync_board_to_github.fix: Ensure GITHUB_TOKEN is set, repo is correct, and TSV is formatted properly. Fix any API errors and rerun the script.

check_shebang.rule: Every Python file must start with a shebang (#!) as the first line.
check_shebang.fix: Add '#!/usr/bin/env python3' as the first line of the file.

check_imports_at_top.rule: All import statements must be grouped at the top of the file, after the shebang and docstring/comments.
check_imports_at_top.fix: Move all import statements to the top of the file, after the shebang and any module docstring/comments.

check_onboarding.rule: Onboarding wizard must be used to enable, suppress, or configure rules for the project.
check_onboarding.fix: Run the onboarding wizard to update .smartai_rules.yaml.

check_docstrings.rule: Every module, class, and function must have a docstring.
check_docstrings.fix: Add missing docstrings to all modules, classes, and functions.

rule_onboarding_wizard.rule: Interactive onboarding wizard for rule configuration.

rule_adoption_analytics.rule: Analyze and report rule adoption rates across the codebase.
rule_adoption_analytics.fix: Run scripts/rule_adoption_analytics.py to generate adoption reports.

rule_auto_tuning.rule: Suggest or auto-tune rule thresholds based on violation patterns.

rule_deprecation_upgrade.rule: Detect deprecated rules and suggest or apply upgrades.
rule_deprecation_upgrade.fix: Run scripts/rule_deprecation_upgrade.py to migrate deprecated rules.

rule_dependency_graph.rule: Generate a visual dependency/conflict graph for rules.

rule_doc_sync.rule: Auto-generate rule documentation from code and config.

rule_drift_detection.rule: Detect if code is drifting from enforced rules.

rule_exception_review.rule: Track and review rule suppressions/overrides with expiry dates.

rule_explainability_ai.rule: Provide explainability and AI suggestions for rule violations.

rule_feedback_loop.rule: Collect and summarize developer feedback on rules.

rule_impact_analysis.rule: Analyze which files are affected by rule changes.

rule_marketplace.rule: Marketplace for sharing and discovering rules.
rule_marketplace.fix: Run scripts/rule_marketplace.py to browse or publish rules.

rule_migration_assistant.rule: Automated assistant for migrating to new or updated rules.

rule_ownership_mapping.rule: Assign, list, or query rule/file ownership.

rule_performance_profiling.rule: Profile and report rule performance and runtime.

rule_release_gates.rule: Block releases if critical rules are violated, with override/escalation workflow.

rule_rollback_hotfix.rule: Auto-revert the last rule/config change if CI fails.

rule_security_patch.rule: Scan and auto-patch rule scripts for security issues.

rule_severity_enforcement.rule: Set or list severity/enforcement for rules.

rule_usage_analytics.rule: Generate a dashboard of rule usage and violation trends.

rule_what_if_simulator.rule: Preview the impact of enabling/disabling rules.

rule_visualization_dashboard.rule: Interactive web dashboard for rule analytics, coverage, drift, and trends.

pr_feedback_bot.rule: Post inline PR comments for rule violations.

cross_repo_rule_consistency.rule: Check rule config consistency across multiple repos.

self_documenting_rules.rule: Auto-generate rule documentation from code and config.
